channel.title: Posts on Hugo tranquilpeak theme
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hugo tranquilpeak theme

item.title: Forecasts are deliberately wrong
item.description: “Forecasts are deliberately wrong”. This confronting remark shot back at me when I told a data science colleague that I am an experience Demand Manager. A part of my shock came from realising that I could see where he was coming from, despite always striving towards achieving a “50/50” forecast; i.e. a forecast with a 50% chance of sitting too high balanced by a 50% chance of sitting too low.

item.title: Cover image showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak integrate a unique “cover image” feature. Open this post to see how this feature sublimate your article.
